data.title: Measurements of the $τ$ Mass and Mass Difference of the $τ^{+}$ and $τ^{-}$} at BaBar
data.text:
TY - JOUR

T1 - Measurements of the $τ$ Mass and Mass Difference of the $τ^{+}$ and $τ^{-}$} at BaBar

AU - Aubert, B.

AU - Playfer, Stephen

AU - The BaBar Collaboration

AU - Clark, Philip

N1 - 15 pages, 10 figures, submitted to Phys. Rev. D

PY - 2009/9/19

Y1 - 2009/9/19

N2 - We present the result from a precision measurement of the mass of the $\tau$ lepton, $M_\tau$, based on $423 fb^{-1}$ of data recorded at the $\Upsilon(4S)$ resonance with the BaBar detector. Using a pseudomass endpoint method, we determine the mass to be $1776.68 \pm 0.12 (stat) \pm 0.41 (syst) MeV$. We also measure the mass difference between the $\tau^+$ and $\tau^-$, and obtain $(M_{\tau^{+}}-M_{\tau^{-}})/M^\tau_{AVG} = (-3.4 \pm 1.3 (stat) \pm 0.3 (syst)) \times 10^{-4}$, where $M^\tau_{AVG}$ is the average value of $M_{\tau^+}$ and $M_{\tau^-}$.

AB - We present the result from a precision measurement of the mass of the $\tau$ lepton, $M_\tau$, based on $423 fb^{-1}$ of data recorded at the $\Upsilon(4S)$ resonance with the BaBar detector. Using a pseudomass endpoint method, we determine the mass to be $1776.68 \pm 0.12 (stat) \pm 0.41 (syst) MeV$. We also measure the mass difference between the $\tau^+$ and $\tau^-$, and obtain $(M_{\tau^{+}}-M_{\tau^{-}})/M^\tau_{AVG} = (-3.4 \pm 1.3 (stat) \pm 0.3 (syst)) \times 10^{-4}$, where $M^\tau_{AVG}$ is the average value of $M_{\tau^+}$ and $M_{\tau^-}$.
